trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Port Richey
There were no other sightings in Port Richey on or around July 7th 2010
Summary: While walking down US Hwy 19 in Port Richey, Florida I looked in the distant sky. I observed what appeared to be a white cylindrical shaped object moving slowly in a southwesterly direction.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were walking to the local walgreens. and as we were approaching our destination. we both noticed off in the distant sky a white cylindrical shaped object moving slowly to the southeast.we noticed it moving in an up and down manner and changing speeds sporadically as well as hovering at times. we also noticed it seemed to become opaque at times as well. we don't live to far from the tampa airport. and we are familiar with commonly seeing all types of aircraft. while this object was like something we have never witnessed before. i would like to find out if anyone else has reported this craft in the same area and time as i have. thanks *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms).
